name: Milky Fade Spot + Scar Serum
about: What it is: A serum for hyperpigmentation that reduces the look of discoloration, spots and scars while supporting the skin barrier...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Redness, and Acne and Blemishes..Formulation: Lightweight Serum..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Niacinamide: Reduces the appearance of hyperpigmentation and evens out the look of skin texture..- Hyaluronic Acid: A humectant that attracts water, leading to hydrated and moisturized skin..- Vitamin C: An antioxidant for brighter-looking and more-even-toned skin...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Blemishes are good at leaving their marku2014whether you pick at them or not. This milky, skin-strengthening formula works hard to fade the look of stubborn spots of all sorts while naturally restoring and replenishing your skinu2019s barrieru2014all while you sleep at night or go about your day...Clinical Results: In a Blume study of 18 participants:.- After 1 week of use, participants saw a noticeable improvement in skin texture, scarring, discoloration, and brightness.- After 4 weeks of use, participants noticed an improvement in scarring and discoloration with their skin looking brighter and clearer.- 3/4 of participants would recommend this product..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Niacinamide: Reduces the appearance of hyperpigmentation and evens out the look of skin texture..-Hyaluronic Acid: A humectant that attracts water, leading to hydrated and moisturized skin..-Vitamin C: An antioxidant for brighter-looking and more-even-toned skin...Water (Aqua), Niacinamide, Butylene Glycol, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract, .Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Glycerin, Sodium .Citrate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Vaccinium .Myrtillus (Bilberry) Fruit Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Acer .Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, .Citrum Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, .Ascorbyl Glucoside, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Tocopheryl (Vitamin E) Acetate, .Xanthan Gum, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply Milky Fade onto clean skin all over or on targeted spotsu2014how you use the power of the fade is up to you..-Once itu2019s dry, seal it in with a creamy moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m on my 3rd bottle. No difference in scaring, though mine are not too bad - I just have a few spots here and there.  However, I always get one or two pimples when I use this serum. I stopped using it for a while, but had a jother bottle to open, and once I did, the breakouts came again.

reviews.review_text: another non working overhype product from Sephora  non working bottle look full of product...dont fall for it there not a lot

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It Has not made a difference to my hyperpigmentation and acne scars, Iu2019ve used half this bottle already

reviews.review_title: Works on ten-years in the making acne scars
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne and acne scars since I'm a teenager and I'm now 27. I started using this product in June 2024. The pictures show my progress after 5 months of daily use. It doesn't work as fast as I would hope (that could be because some scars are old and I've had other breakouts in between), but it definitely works! Excited to see what it's going to look like after one year of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: An acne scar must!!! I have some scarring and discolouration from picking my skin (especially on my arms and face) and this has been miraculous at fading them and leaving my skin looking new and fresh. Love that I can get results without using chemicals or peels!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A fantastic milky but substantial hydrating serum that's just loaded with great ingredients!  I don't deal with much scarring, but Milky Fade has been fantastic for reducing overall texture and it leaves my skin looking plump, hydrated and extra glowy.  No noticeable scent, which I also love

reviews.review_title: This is THE one, babes! ud83dude0d
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only product Iu2019ve found that consistently keeps my skin clear and reduces the time it takes for any hormonal breakouts that happen to go away. I have noticed a significant change in my skin texture and scarring from past breakouts, and it is OBVIOUS when Iu2019ve run out of this product and donu2019t have it in my daily routine. Itu2019s my favorite product in my skincare lineup, and I cannot recommend it highly enough!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using milky fade for a while now on my forehead acne scars. It has been a saving grace for me! It makes me feel finally confident again not to have these stubborn marks on my forehead!! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I suffered from hormonal acne for 6 years. I finally have it under control thanks to this product as well as meltdown.  I started with the Blume babies to give it a shot and I saw instant results over the first couple days. After finishing the babies and getting the big sizes I still have the acne under control!  I love this product and would recommend to anyone suffering with hormonal acne.  THANK YOU BLUME

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i used this product because i got a BIG scar on the bridge of my nose from using mandated masks at work. i was pretty upset, i saw blume had this product but never used it before but i had high hopes from other products i used before. i used the product nightly and always with spf the following day, by the time i finished the bottle my scar was completely gone. i didnu2019t take any pictures of before but you actually canu2019t tell there was a big scar across my nose before!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift from someone who swears by it and it did not disappoint. I suffer from terrible acne scars and this has been truly revolutionary. The longer I used it the more my scars would diminish and lighten. It soaks into my skin so smoothly, does not have or leave a tacky feeling and is so easy to incorporate into my daily routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A staple in my skincare routine! Love a good serum especially one that targets acne scars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blume's Milky Fade Spot + Scar Serum has been my new go-to! My face suffered for years with post acne marks, scars, and all around hyperpigmentation. This serum absorbs into my skin beautifully. I am always left feeling smooth and hydrated. The results are what boosted my confidence. All my redness was taken away, while my deeper marks have been on a journey of finally healing. I am more than happy and highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: helped to fade acne scars absolutely love this product and it's in my nightly skincare routine

reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for roughly 2 weeks. I would say it works well. I had some previous discolouration acne masks on my cheeks and they have faded quite a bit. They are almost gone. This product did not break me out.

Hello, have a good week everyone!  I'm happy to continue my discovery of @blume products! Which I just discovered! I had the   My 2ufe0fu20e3 product: ud83dudcabud83dudcabud83dudcab  Milky Fade Spot and Scar Fade Serum  Itu2019s a pretty little container in a soft lilac color!  This product aims to reduce your brown spots and acne scars; it gives you a more uniform complexion!  This serum:  Restores your skin by providing it with a skin barrier! Method of use, morning, evening and even during the day if your skin seems more acne-prone! Itu2019s a gentle formula and soothes redness!  Ingredients :ud83cudf1fud83cudf1fud83cudf1f  Water-based, centella asiatica extract, niacinamide, glycerin, fruit extract, aloe Barbadensis leaf juice, hyaluronic acid  My impression :ud83eudd14ud83eudd14ud83eudd14  Soft or even milky in texture, odorless with the face applicator targeting the places where you want to focus your attention! Hydration is immediate, the complexion seems more even and harmonious! I really like this serum!

reviews.review_text: This product is the only thing that has worked to fade dark spots I have had for years left over from acne. So happy I tried this product instead of spending $1500 on microdermabrasion techniques. Would recommend trying to anyone who has struggled with stubborn dark spots!

The bottle feels heavy but in reality thereu2019s not a ton of product inside. I think this product is far too expensive for a brand like this. I feel like I was duped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I suffered from acne as a teenager and have never been happy with my skin since. I found it helped to smooth out the rougher areas of damaged skin and my pores look visably reduced! One to keep in the skin care inventory.

reviews.review_title: Total game changer for stubborn acne marks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in my late 30's with pale, very oily, and acne prone skin. I have been struggling with hormonal acne breakouts around my chin and under the jawline for years. Yes, birth control pills help, but I don't want to be on them for decades. Recently, I was feeling down about all the small, dark red marks that were left around my chin and under the jawline from previous breakouts. I would spend 15 min every day trying to cover them up with concealer before I leave the house. Then I came across this  wonderful product. It's a milky, liquidy gel that you're supposed to put on the dark spots you want to fade. Then you can apply moisturizer/serum/primer/makeup etc. I wait 10 to 15 min for the gel to fully dry before I apply my moisturizer and makeup. The product does feel a tad sticky and may pill if you apply too much under your makeup so use sparingly. I have been using this religiously day and night for 3 weeks. The dark spots that I have from previous breakouts have significantly decreased. To me, this product is non-comedogenic, non-acnegenic, and does not make my skin feel dry or irritated. I love it so much and will repurchase. Sure, it's a bit pricey, but since you only need a pea-sized amount or so to dab onto problem areas, the bottle should last you a long time. I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This serum broke me out in whiteheads within 3  days of using it. Be careful if you have sensitive skin. Like horrendus whitheaads my whole face was covered in them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has faded my hyperpigmentation & sun damage so much. The texture of my skin has got a lot better also. I love it as a makeup primer as well! Treat and fade is my fav kit to buy

reviews.review_text: I've struggled with hormonal acne for the past few years and it's not easy finding the right product to work for me. And this is a God send! If your on the fence, just get it! You won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_text: It is working great. I had some marks which are fading and plus I can also see a glow on my face

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for about a week and Iu2019m already noticing a difference in the severity of my post-acne marks! The best part is that it doesnu2019t irritate my sensitive skin, so Iu2019m finally able to use a vitamin C product in my routine. Very excited to see how things progress in the coming weeks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was worth every penny. I saw it at Sephora in store and needed to try this out. I have a lot of acne scars due to my past and Iu2019ve been trying to figure out a way to make them fade. I used this product and eventually saw results. My skin felt clean and felt brighter. Dark spots were fading as well. I can not wait try more Blume products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so I experienced acne 4 years ago and as we all know acne is the WORST, confidence killer, and finding a solution became yet another item on my never ending to do list. Once it finally cleared up, I was left with scarring which is still existent 4 years later. For years Iu2019ve been motivated and persistent to find a solution. Iu2019ve tried microneedle, peels, and about every brightening product there is.    Then I found BLUME. Every one of their products is relevant for girlies with acne/ scarring, but the serum is IMMACULATE. it feels nice, has trustworthy Ingredients, and most importantly it works. My skin feels smoother, looks brighter, and scarring is reduced. WOW. feeling more confident than ever- and Iu2019m out here sending no makeup selfies to all of my friends LOL.   10/10. Will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product so much, it's very hydrating and gentle for my acne prone skin. I do see a difference in my acne scars after a week or so of applying it. I also like the subtle glow it gives me.

reviews.review_title: Takes time to lighten dark spots
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does work for me but it takes time to show lightened dark spots. When applied to the face it is tacky even when dries to follow up with moisturizer and sunscreen!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So happy with this! It visibly reduced my dark spots!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo happy with this product! Just after a few days, I noticed my scars getting better!! Highly recommend for anyone dealing with stubborn pigmentation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite products to heal my scars from scratching my pimples off. I shouldnu2019t do it but I dou2026 and this has been my life saver! Couple days and they already heal a little!! Magical

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a few weeks now and after a few days, I have already noticed a difference in my skin texture. I have sensitive skin, but this product is gentle and doesn't irritate it!  My redness has definitely gone down and my skin looks much smoother and brighter. Will be continuing to add this to my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Itu2019s non-sticky and smooth on the skin. Over a few weeks, I noticed my acne scars and pigmentation spots become less visible. My complexion looks better and I love the feel of the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally received this product as a gift from Blume. The texture is nice, a bit thinner than I expected for a spot treatment serum. I havenu2019t used it long enough to see results but hopefully if I continue I will!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this serum for over a month and have been absolutely loving it! I use alongside the Sunbeam face mask (1-2 times a week) and have noticed considerable reduction in redness and acne scarring! I have sensitive skin, and have had no reaction to either product! This serum wears great under my daily moisturizer, has no scent, and doesnu2019t make me oily throughout the day! Will continue to use this serum in my everyday routine!!

reviews.review_title: slow & steady - fades acne scars over time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this about a month and it's helped to fade inflamed scarred areas on my cheek and chin. I noticed the scars today when I was flushed during a workout, but day to day they're much less noticeable and my skin is smoother. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_title: Does exactly what it says it will!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum really exceeded my expectations. I saw a huge improvement in darkened spots from past blemishes in only a week. It's so soothing for my skin and absorbs incredibly well.

One of my most favourite serums ever! It's very soothing on my sensitive skin and absorbs really fast leaving my skin so smooth. I use it daily on my face and body and i can see my dark acne scars fading gradually with each use! RECOMMENDED!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This did exactly what it says it will. My acne scars have faded away quite a bit since starting this product. Have recommended it to friends and family as well and so far they have had great experiences as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After a week of using this I have actually noticed a difference which is shocking for me cause Iu2019m covered in freckles. This has not made me break out either. I am beyond excited to try the other products because this one is going to be a staple in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say this is a great serum! The texture is thick and gel like. Im not sure why everyone says the scent is strong. There really isnt a scent at all and I have tried MANY ! It absorbed so easily into the skin. Had a great water base feeling. I think this is a very strong contender and will only get better in time. Job well done guys ! It is also reasonably priced so this does reflect the product per dollar value point ! Did not disappoint.
Obsessed! This serum cleared up some stubborn acne scars after two weeks of using it everyday. I use it after Superpower!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this every night for the past few weeks. So far it has not irritated my sensitive skin. It is nice and lightweight with little to no scent, since I am also sensitive to some fragrance. Will continue using and hope it can fade some hyperpigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product has worked wonders for my oily/acne prone skin. It has visibly reduced my acne scars and has helped prevent breakouts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Havenu2019t used it yet but I really think itu2019s gonna work. The smell isnu2019t to strong

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After 1 month of use, I do see some improvements on my sun spots and acne scars. My skin tone is slowly evening out. Iu2019m almost done my first bottle. Its lightweight and does not pill underneath my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Helped to smooth skin and dark spots. Took a few weeks for my skin to adjust. Slightly tacky formula so you need to wait for it to dry before applying lotion afterwards, otherwise it pills.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really disappointed that I did not see any results as thereu2019s not a lot of products aimed directly at acne scarring. Didnu2019t even help stopping more acne from forming. Think the best way for acne scarring is too bite the bullet and get laser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product because of the good reviews and it did not disappoint me!!  Amazing results for acne/scars. Itu2019s improving my hormonal acne that I always had on my chin. Definitely buying this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I went on a whim and tried this for my acne scarring... I have already repurchased!!!! It is such a nice serum, lightweight but powerful. I love that it doesn't have a strong smell. This has really improved my skin a lot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this serum for a couple days and I already see a difference on my skin. Some of my darks spots already started to go away. The serum is really smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was never one to use serums until I found this one! I absolutely love it! I've only been using it for about two weeks and I already see a difference! For reference I have sensitive oily(ish) skin. I 100% recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Used it for a week, got my face really bad and agravated my acne instead of helping to reduce scars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for the acne scars on my chin and it broke out ny skin sooooo badly after 1 time. It broke me out in places I had never broken out before. I returned immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i used this to reduce and try to get rid of my acne scars/redness and it didn't really do anything for me. the only thing it did is maintain the redness, meaning it didn't get worse and it didn't get better. i was hoping that it would get rid of the redness but it didn't for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m three weeks in to using this product and these are my thoughts;   First off, I have super sensitive skin and didnu2019t experience any irritation at all. Product is really gentle. Love the packaging, the pump is super easy to use. This serum has a sort of thick gel texture, no fragrance at all that I can tell. The instructions said to use two pumps, but that wasnu2019t enough for me so I used three. I use it every morning after my cleanser and before my moisturizer.   After the first week, I didnu2019t notice too much of a difference in the appearance of my scars but, to be fair, I have a LOT of them from experiencing major mascne for the past two years. Still, I saw a huge improvement in the texture of my skin. Noticeably smoother.   After the second week, I saw an definite improvement in the newer scars I had. I could see that new blemishes I had werenu2019t leaving any new scarring which was awesome.   After this third week, my scars have faded beautifully overall. None of the redness I was experiencing all the time and the strength and texture of my skin is so much better. A lot of my bigger scars are still there, but I think with consistent use in combination with the right exfoliants, Iu2019ll finally be able to get rid of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve very recently started using this and have noticed a difference already. I donu2019t have many dark spots or acne scars on my face, but Iu2019ve been using it on stubborn scars I have on my hands and have noticed them lightening for sure. The texture is really smooth and light, and it absorbs really well. It doesnu2019t feel sticky or oily on the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this serum in my routine everyday after Sunbeam or Superpower and it's definitely made a difference for my stubborn acne scars that I've tried just about everything to get rid of in just 2 weeks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product alongside the Sunbeam Exfoliating Mask and the Superpower Clay Mask. My skin is superrrr sensitive!! I have lots of acne scarring; I tried chemical peels, microdermabrasion and microneedling too! These products are my holy grail! My skin has been glowing!!!! I've had so many people ask me what I have done to improve my skin! I couldn't be happier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product to apply it is very easy and its texture very moisturizing leaving my skin moisturized and radiant with a natural glow. I have been using it for a couple of days now and I can tell the difference so I can't wait to see the results in a week !!!! The packaging is very cute

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved this product!!! It helped so much with my scars!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It feels so hydrating and soothing on the skin and it helped brighten up my skin! It is very gentle on my sensitive skin and helped me with my dark spots!

reviews.review_text: I love this product for dark spots! Itu2019s lightweight and smooths/brightens your skin. Donu2019t expect it to get rid of any deep scars (like ice pick type scars), but if youu2019re persistent, youu2019ll definitely notice a difference!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: such a good product! I've struggled with acne scars my whole and I've noticed a difference using this! Use it regularly to see results.

reviews.review_text: love this product!!  i use it everyday and have seen a difference since i,ve started! would recommend buying

reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved this product! So gentle yet effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great product! In just a few days I noticed a difference in my skins evenness and is very moisturizing, left my skin silky smooth!
